short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension for Google Chrome lets you know about new Posts of Appspart before anyone else

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AppsPart is a tech Blog that helps you to get Latest Tech Update of Android App, PC, MAC as well as iPhone. The Addon will help you to get new posts before anyone else. The app will send you notifications of newly published article.
